name: Summer Program
description: A project-based program for teens that develops their art and entrepreneurship skills. Participants will be paid a stipend along with given additional funding for their project as the program progresses. The program takes place over 12 in person and virtual sessions over 6 weeks. Participants will need to dedicate some time outside to build their project/craft.

howToGetIt: Apply via Google Forms (can be found on our website or Instagram). Application only requires some personal and logistical questions. Participants then go through an interview and onboarding process. Online FORM
